Confidential.definition: known or conveyed only to a limited number of people [a disclosure] 2

1.definition: known or conveyed only to a limited number of people [a disclosure]

2.definition: marked by or indicative of intimacy, mutual trust, or willingness to confide esp. between parties one of whom is in a position of superiority [the relationship of doctor and patient]

3.definition: containing information whose unauthorized disclosure could be prejudicial to the national interest
